fixes.name: Delta Down USD 5Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 5Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level multiplication [Delta Down T USD 5Y]* [Date Sign] into a DAX measure by mapping each field to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format and using the * operator for multiplication.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The 'Date Sign' field references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date]); any calculation depending on parameters must be implemented as a measure.
